title: Plop and the Workstation 9.x UEFI do not work

forumNotes.author: Balubeto Balubeto
forumNotes.content:
Hi

I noticed that, if I enable the UEFI in a virtual machine in VMware Workstation 9.x, the Plop Boot Manager 5.0.15-test (plpbt.iso) does not start. How come?

Thanks

Bye

forumNotes.author: jojo2005
forumNotes.content:
Why do you use Plop Boot Manager ?

You dont need it for UEFI Mode on VMWare.

1. Boot in UEFI Bootmanager (F2)
2. Enable your USB Stick (in the right corner of the bootwindow)
3. Shutdown
4. Boot again in UEFI Bootmanager (F2) voila the USB Stick Entry is visible
5. Select the Entry and push ENTER (The Setup will start, Win8 or Linux)

regards

jo
